item.title: A General Multiplication Theorem for Multivariate Hermite Polynomials
item.description: arXiv:2601.19954v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: The multiplication theorem for univariate Hermite polynomials $H_k(\lambda x)$ is well-known. In this paper we generalize this result to multivariate Hermite polynomials ${\rm H}_{\bf k}({\mathbf{\Lambda}}{\bf x};{\mathbf{\Sigma}})$, and use this result to derive a multiplication theorem for univariate polynomials applied to inner-products $H_k({\mathbf{\lambda}}^{\rm T} {\bf x})$.
item.dc:creator: Alistair Shilton

item.title: Fuzzy Fault Trees: the Fast and the Formal
item.description: arXiv:2507.02886v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: We provide a rigorous framework for handling uncertainty in quantitative fault tree analysis based on fuzzy theory. We show that any algorithm for fault tree unreliability analysis can be adapted to this framework in a fully general and computationally efficient manner. This result crucially leverages both the alpha-cut representation of fuzzy numbers and the coherence property of fault trees. We evaluate our algorithms on an established benchmark of synthetic fault trees, demonstrating their practical effectiveness.
item.dc:creator: Thi Kim Nhung Dang, Benedikt Peterseim, Milan Lopuha\"a-Zwakenberg, Mari\"elle Stoelinga
